message.content:
BUG: Product guides are not showing in the UI.

Files to check:
- src/data/guides/ - Guide content files
- src/components/results/tabs/ - Look for GuidesTab or where guides should display
- src/app/results/page.tsx - Results page tabs
- src/types/guides.ts - Guide types

The guides system was implemented (Phase 0-2 complete per CLAUDE.md) but not visible in UI.

1. Find where guides should be displayed
2. Check if GuidesTab component exists
3. Wire guides into the results page tabs if missing
4. Test that guides render correctly

This is an implementation task - create missing components and wire them up.

content.text: I'll investigate why the product guides aren't showing in the UI and implement the missing components.

    26â†’      content: `You're here because you want to look better. Good. That's the first step.

    28â†’But here's what nobody tells you: **most guys fail not because they don't know what to do, but because their mindset is cooked from day one.**
    29â†’
    30â†’They're either:
    31â†’- Paralyzed by analysis (reading guides instead of taking action)
    32â†’- Expecting overnight results (then quitting after 2 weeks)
    33â†’- Comparing themselves to genetic outliers (and feeling defeated)
    34â†’- Looking for shortcuts (spoiler: there aren't any)
    35â†’
    36â†’This guide is about fixing that before you waste months spinning your wheels.`,
    37â†’    },
    38â†’    {
    39â†’      id: 'mistake-1-perfectionism',
    40â†’      title: 'Mistake #1: Waiting for the "Perfect" Plan',
    41â†’      humorLevel: 'high',
    42â†’      content: `You've bookmarked 47 articles. You've saved 200 Instagram posts. You've downloaded 12 PDFs. You've done exactly **zero** actual work.
    43â†’
    44â†’**This ain't it, chief.**
    45â†’
    46â†’The perfect routine doesn't exist. There's no secret combination of products and exercises that will unlock chad-tier genetics. There's just consistent effort over time.
    47â†’
    48â†’Here's the brutal truth: a mediocre plan executed consistently beats a perfect plan you never start.
    49â†’
    50â†’**Action Step:** Pick ONE thing from this app to improve. Just one. Do it for 30 days before adding anything else.`,

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.

file.content:
/**
 * Mindset & Beginner Mistakes Guide
 * Humor Level: High (30%)
 */

import { Guide } from '@/types/guides';

export const mindsetGuide: Guide = {
  id: 'mindset',
  slug: 'mindset-mistakes',
  title: 'Mindset & Beginner Mistakes',
  subtitle: "The cope stops here",
  description: "Before you spend a dime, fix the mental game. Most guys sabotage themselves before they even start.",
  icon: 'Brain',
  humorLevel: 'high',
  estimatedReadTime: 8,
  order: 1,
  tags: ['mindset', 'beginners', 'fundamentals'],
  relatedGuides: ['maintenance', 'body-fat'],
  productIds: [],
  sections: [
    {
      id: 'intro',
      title: 'The Real Talk',
      humorLevel: 'high',
      content: `You're here because you want to look better. Good. That's the first step.

But here's what nobody tells you: **most guys fail not because they don't know what to do, but because their mindset is cooked from day one.**

They're either:
- Paralyzed by analysis (reading guides instead of taking action)
- Expecting overnight results (then quitting after 2 weeks)
- Comparing themselves to genetic outliers (and feeling defeated)
- Looking for shortcuts (spoiler: there aren't any)

This guide is about fixing that before you waste months spinning your wheels.`,
    },
    {
      id: 'mistake-1-perfectionism',
      title: 'Mistake #1: Waiting for the "Perfect" Plan',
      humorLevel: 'high',
      content: `You've bookmarked 47 articles. You've saved 200 Instagram posts. You've downloaded 12 PDFs. You've done exactly **zero** actual work.

**This ain't it, chief.**

The perfect routine doesn't exist. There's no secret combination of products and exercises that will unlock chad-tier genetics. There's just consistent effort over time.

Here's the brutal truth: a mediocre plan executed consistently beats a perfect plan you never start.

**Action Step:** Pick ONE thing from this app to improve. Just one. Do it for 30 days before adding anything else.`,

content.text:
Perfect! Let me create a summary document of the implementation:

## Bug Fix Complete: Product Guides Now Visible in UI

### Root Cause Analysis

**The Bug:** Product guides system (Phase 0-2) was implemented with all data structures, types, and content in place, but was not visible in the UI because:

1. The `'guides'` tab was missing from the `ResultsTab` type definition
2. No `GuidesTab` component existed to render the guide content
3. The guides tab was not wired into the results page navigation

**Execution Trace:**
```
User visits /results â†’ ResultsLayout renders tabs
    â†’ TABS array defined (line 38-50)
    â†’ Missing 'guides' tab entry
    â†’ GuidesTab component doesn't exist
    â†’ Guide data exists but never rendered
```

### Fix Implementation

**Files Modified:**

1. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/types/results.ts`**
   - Added `'guides'` to `ResultsTab` union type (line 202)

2. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/Results.tsx`**
   - Imported `GuidesTab` component (line 10)
   - Added `case 'guides': return <GuidesTab />` to switch statement (line 69-70)

3. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/ResultsLayout.tsx`**
   - Imported `BookOpen` icon from lucide-react (line 20)
   - Added guides tab to TABS array: `{ id: 'guides', label: 'Guides', icon: <BookOpen size={18} /> }` (line 46)

**New Component Created:**

4. **`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/tabs/GuidesTab.tsx`**
   - Full-featured guide browsing interface with:
     - **GuideStatsCard**: Shows total guides (9) and reading time (95 minutes)
     - **SearchBar**: Real-time guide search by title/description/tags
     - **CategorySection**: Organized display by 3 categories (Fundamentals, Physique, Appearance)
     - **GuideCard**: Individual guide display with icon, title, subtitle, description, sections count, products count, read time
     - Color-coded by category (cyan/purple/amber)
     - Hover animations and responsive grid layout
     - Search results view with result count

### Guide System Stats

| Component | Count | Details |
|-----------|-------|---------|
| **Total Guides** | 9 | mindset, maintenance, body-fat, v-taper, training, core-neck, cardio, diet, skincare |
| **Categories** | 3 | Fundamentals (3), Physique (4), Appearance (2) |
| **Total Reading Time** | 95 minutes | Across all guides |
| **Products Referenced** | 19 unique | From 33-product registry |
| **Sections** | 50+ | Across all guides |

### Testing Results

| Test | Status | Details |
|------|--------|---------|
| TypeScript Compilation | âœ… Pass | `npx tsc --noEmit` - no errors |
| ESLint | âœ… Pass | Fixed unused import + escaped quotes |
| Next.js Build | âœ… Pass | Compiled /results in 3.4s (3117 modules) |
| Page Load | âœ… Pass | HTTP 200, renders correctly |
| Tab Navigation | âœ… Pass | Guides tab appears in sidebar between "Your Plan" and "Community" |

### UI Features Implemented

**Guide Browsing:**
- 9 guides organized into 3 color-coded categories
- Each guide shows: icon, title, funny subtitle, description, read time, section count, product count
- Responsive grid layout (1 col mobile, 2 cols desktop)
- Smooth hover animations and transitions

**Search Functionality:**
- Real-time search by title, description, subtitle, or tags
- Result count display
- Empty state for no results
- Search clears to show category view

**Visual Design:**
- Category-specific colors (Fundamentals: cyan, Physique: purple, Appearance: amber)
- Gradient backgrounds with border highlights
- Icon badges with category colors
- Clock icon for read time
- ChevronRight arrow on hover for "clickable" feel

### Prevention

To prevent this issue in the future:
1. When adding new data systems, ensure UI components are created in same PR
2. Document tab additions in CLAUDE.md feature checklist
3. Add E2E test for new tab rendering

### Related Files

**Core Implementation:**
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/types/results.ts` - Tab type
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/tabs/GuidesTab.tsx` - Guide UI
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/Results.tsx` - Tab routing
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/ResultsLayout.tsx` - Tab navigation

**Guide Data (Phase 0-2):**
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/data/guides/` - All guide content
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/types/guides.ts` - Type definitions
- `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/region.ts` - Region utilities

The product guides are now fully visible and functional in the results page UI. Users can browse all 9 guides organized by category or search for specific topics.
